feature_name: Navigation link-state cleanup and Field Notes first-paint stability
scope_summary: Normalize visited link colors for nav/buttons/content, align fallback header links with production header links, and preload Field Notes styles so the Field Notes surface does not jump after page load.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Changes are presentational and reduce misleading state changes in UI links.
evidence: No legal copy, terms, or policy semantics changed
Link labels and destinations remain transparent

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: No new storage, telemetry, or data flow was introduced.
evidence: CSS and static HTML updates only
No new network calls in assets/site.js

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: No diagnostic, treatment, or efficacy language added.
evidence: Only style and navigation behavior updated

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Reducing visual instability lowers cognitive friction and supports predictable interaction.
evidence: Visited/active link colors no longer shift unexpectedly
Field Notes styles now load on first paint

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Predictable visual behavior reduces context-switch cost and supports low-load navigation.
evidence: Field Notes no longer relies on delayed style injection for base layout

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users get consistent link rendering and reduced layout shift without feature loss.
evidence: Route sanity check passed on touched pages
Fallback header now points to the same Dopamine Depot destination as the partial

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: No hype language added; messaging remains accurate and direct.
evidence: No conversion or promise copy changed

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Focus-visible behavior remains explicit and link contrast consistency improved for repeated visits.
evidence: a:visited styles now pinned to brand colors
Field Notes focus-visible outline remains intact

security_and_reliability.rationale: No executable dependency changes; fewer runtime divergences between fallback and partial markup.
evidence: Inline header fallback destination now matches partial header
No broken internal hrefs found in touched pages

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No pricing, checkout, upsell, or monetization flow changes.

ship_decision.conditions: Deploy and verify /hub.html, /field-notes/, and /field-notes.html for stable first paint and consistent link color states (default, visited, and active).
